website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic weighted hula hoop for beginners, due to its decent weight, copious layers of padded foam, and comfortable waist belt to shield your torso from potential bruising from everyday use.
pros: Hula hoop segments easily disassemble at the press of a button
cons: It’s too bad that this otherwise great weighted hula hoop is only available in black and grey

customer_reviews.title: BREAKS INSTANTLY
customer_reviews.text: will not stay put together and flys apart instantly. complete scam and waste of money I have bought weighted hoops before and this one was the second that i've bought. truly terrible.
customer_reviews.author: eviezamora

customer_reviews.title: hula your way to a six pack!
customer_reviews.text: So I don't know if you can actually hula hoop your way to a six pack but this hoop will surely help you get closer! I always loved hooping as a kid and now I can do it for exercise. I did a lot of research on different ones and I am glad I got this one. It does not come apart while using it and if it did you for, then you didn't clip them in correctly. They are hard to take apart but I don't need to do that often. I think its the perfect weight too!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: It is not a hoop if it won't stay close!
customer_reviews.text: It keeps falling apart when I try to use it!!! After it flew out and almost hit my plant, I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have used weighted hoops a lot in the past and this one is just plain weird. It’s oddly flimsy in parts and wriggles in the oddest ways. Absolutely not worth the money and I really gave it a genuine go but I just don’t like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Smash

customer_reviews.title: It works yeah
customer_reviews.text: It's a weighted hula hoop alright. And I returned it. Because I didnt realize how much of the fun was sucked out of hula hooping when its 3+ pounds around your waist, just so you'll get toned "quicker". Just get a jumprope, regulate healthy eating, and safely waist train if you're so hell bent on having a smaller waist. Or just love yoself for what you are! Life is short, damnit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly well made
customer_reviews.text: Easy peasy assembly, if only the hula hooping was as easy. I'm 6' 220 muscular pounds, with a 34" waist and it is plenty big enough, and the weight is plenty. It's a work out. Money well spent. It WILL bruise you, so the included waist belt is great.
customer_reviews.author: Piggypower

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any problems with it falling apart. You can feel some of the knobs that hold it together but it's not so uncomfortable to stop use. I do not use the belt bc it makes the hoop ride lower on me. However my son loves the belt and wears it every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Travel hoop
customer_reviews.text: I buckle boot until eclipse. It's very hard to release the who clips. It is flimsy because of the the phone around the hoop. I love that it is portable
customer_reviews.author: sarah whitlow

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, worth for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you like thick rattan hula hoop, you will like this. The quality is good, the customer service is good, the packaging is good, no bad smell. Easy assemble. Definitely is a good product and worth it !
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: This item was easy to assemble, durable and fun to do.
customer_reviews.author: NaturalJW

customer_reviews.title: Great Exercise!
customer_reviews.text: The hoop is heavier than I would have thought, but overall is great!
customer_reviews.author: An N

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop
customer_reviews.text: When I received this item it had great packaging. Everything came promptly. It is very balanced and easy to throw. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kristian Clegg

customer_reviews.title: I luv it
customer_reviews.text: Luv it. I luv the weight really work me up.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: too heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is not for a beginner. It's too heavy for someone learning how to hula hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I used to love my hola hoop as a child. And now I love my new and improved hola hoop as an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Medina

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: it's little bigger than I thought, but the weighted feature makes it super easy to use, very fun!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A Burke

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted. Easy to put together and arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Literally just fell apart on 1st use
customer_reviews.text: As my review title says...it literally just came apart on first use. I am well aware of how to assemble as I have been using weighted hoops for over 5 years. This one is just junk, apparently.
customer_reviews.author: JenP

customer_reviews.title: Hula hooping is great, this hula hoop is not.
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to put together... the press system to lock comes undone, it took me forever to put it together and it still falls apart when I try to use it. Theres no way I can take it apart or I'll be spending all my time just trying to put it together again. Look for one with a better locking system of one that comes put together.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Janosek

product_meta.title: UNPARALLELED Weighted Fitness Hoop Bundle with Waist Belt & Extra Foam Padding for Exercise, Weight Loss & Burning Fat - Dance & Workout Hoola Hoops for Adults 3lbs
feature_bullets: ✅ HAVE FUN, LOSE WEIGHT - Why lift and grunt when you can play and dance? Our fitness hoop strengthens your core while burning fat without the boring gym regimen. You can use it on your arms and legs, too!

✅ SAFE & COMFORTABLE WORKOUT - With extra-thick foam padding and a waist belt, you get extra protection on your hips and prevent bruising at the same time. The strong push-button mechanism prevents separation during use.
✅ BURN MORE CALORIES - Made of durable materials, our fitness hoop is designed to last for a very long time. The foam is thick to reduce tearing and the non-recycled plastic core won't crack easily.

✅ DANCE ANYWHERE - Our fitness hoop is detachable with the push of a button, and lightweight, so you can take it with you while traveling. For your convenience, we've added a carrying bag to our bundle.
✅ 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - We provide you UNPARALLELED quality and service. If you are not satisfied with your order, just let us know and we'll send you a full refund. No questions asked!
